scripts.build:core: npm run build -w @freesail/logger && npm run build -w @freesail/core && npm run build -w @freesail/react
scripts.build:catalogs: npm run build -w @freesail/catalogs && npm run build -w @freesail-community/weathercatalog
scripts.build:sdk: npm run build -w freesail && npm run build -w @freesail/gateway && npm run build -w @freesail/agentruntime
scripts.build:example: npm run build -w freesail-agent-example && npm run build -w freesail-react-example
scripts.build: npm run sync && npm run build:core && npm run build:catalogs && npm run build:sdk && npm run build:example
scripts.pack:all: npm run clean:publish && npm run pack:workspaces
